title: Nursing: recreational and cccupational therapy
creator_credit: Ted Nemeth Studios and United States. Office of Education
brief_description: Shows the role of the nurse in the rehabilitation of a teen-age boy who had a spinal injury, by using physical, functional, occupational and diversional therapy.
